attributes.action: Disregard the Advisory EU Referendum because the electorate were wilfully misled
attributes.additional_details:
Nigel Farage 'I can't guarantee EU cash will go to NHS'
Leave campaign confused EU and Non-EU immigration and treated them as the same
attributes.background: Following the result of the Advisory EU Referendum being announced, comments were made by Leave campaigners (official and otherwise) to the effect that the information they used in the campaign was inaccurate or unsupportable. On this basis, people voted to Leave who would otherwise have Remained.
